name: Disable Win Defender Notification
description: Disable Win Defender Notification. Redline is using this to disable this win defender feature.

data.command: reg add "HKLM\SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Windows Defender Security Center\Notifications" /v "DisableNotifications" /t REG_DWORD /d 1 /f
reg add "HKLM\SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Windows Defender Security Center\Notifications" /v "DisableNotifications" /t REG_DWORD /d 0 /f
